Cheating epidemic in official matchmaking regardless of prime status, matchmaking matches wildly different ranks forcing higher ranked players to play with vastly different skill levels for essentially no rank progress upon win and a large mmr loss if you lose. $15 Operation passes with garbage content and weapon/operator skins to funnel more money into Valve's pockets while the horrible server quality remains the same. If not for the original design of this game and its community, this game would rot. Valve deserve none of your time or energy, but Counter-Strike does.
